xxl.connectivity.colt
Class ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper.DiscreteUniform

java.lang.Object
  cern.colt.PersistentObject
      cern.jet.random.AbstractDistribution
          cern.jet.random.AbstractDiscreteDistribution
              xxl.connectivity.colt.ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper.DiscreteUniform
All Implemented Interfaces:
DoubleFunction, IntFunction, Serializable, Cloneable
Enclosing class:
ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper
public static class ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper.DiscreteUniform
extends AbstractDiscreteDistribution

This class uses the continuous uniform distribution shipped with colt to provide a discrete uniform distribution.

See Also:
